channel.title: Retros on Conor Lamb's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Retros on Conor Lamb's Blog

item.title: April 2025: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: Goals Met: ~90% Song Of The Month (listen while reading!): HOT TO GO! - Chappell Roan - Girl Power Pop April and May are great months in Berlin. A good portion of the public holidays are crammed into these 2 months. I’ve definitely been taking advantage of that, but I probably could have been a bit more productive. I’ve had this strange and chronic anxiousness the last week or 2. It’s an anxiousness that I find I’m prone to.

item.title: March 2025: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: Goals Met: ~80% Song Of The Month (listen while reading!): Dragonborn - Jeremy Soule - Skyrim Soundtrack For the second year in a row I’ve missed the February retrospective. Totally fell through the cracks some how. I guess I’ll use my goals from January here. How did I do with last month’s goals? Music - Solo Project | Band Project Finish 1 SE.CORP song Result: F I have around 5 50-75% finished songs, which have actually been fun to make.

item.title: January 2025: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: Goals Met: ~90% Song Of The Month (listen while reading!): PicarÃ³n - Mexican Indie Time flies. Each retrospective I’ve completed marks a month of my life, I can see in the files here that they are really starting to pile up. How did I do with last month’s goals? Music - Solo Project | Band Project Prepare for the CORP. release show Results: A Our release show went spectacularly. It took up a good bit of my mental space for the first 3 weeks of Jan.

item.title: 2024: Conor's Yearly Retrospective
item.description: Goals Met: ~80% Song Of The Year (listen while reading!): New Tricks - Petite League - Indie Pop How did I do with last year’s goals? ðŸŸ¡Â Kill SkinTheory or get it off my mind completely. Results: A The wheels are in motion, SkinTheory as an Inc. is officially no more. I haven’t thought about it much. SkinTheory the app is still alive, and kind of just sitting there in a holding pattern until I want to come back to it, or apple/google make a change to the app store.

item.title: December 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: Goals Met: ~60% Song Of The Month (listen while reading!): Romeo - Sures - Indie Pop Planned for this, but wasn’t able to get much done between being in the US, catching up with friends, and being in Ireland for Xmas. How did I do with last month’s goals? Music - Solo Project | Band Project Plan (Marketing / Performance) for Berghain release show Result: C+ Hashed out the basic idea for the performance with Josh but I need to really set the performance stuff in stone.

item.title: November 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: Goals Met: ~70% Song Of The Month (listen while reading!): Pink Pony Club - Chappell Roan - Pop Last month I was a bit too ambitious in my goal setting. I spent the last week of the month on holiday in the US, so I was unable to work on anything productive there. Before I left, I ended up being pretty busy as well. How did I do with last month’s goals?

item.title: October 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: Goals Met: ~90% Song Of The Month (listen while reading!): Boy Toy - STRFKR - Synth Pop October was interesting. I actually got the bulk of my goals completed within the first 2 weeks. But I’m tired of seeing people and parties. I didn’t get a lot of time for head space or extra curricular work. I’ve also been sick for like 3 weeks. How did I do with last month’s goals?

item.title: September 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: Goals Met: ~85% Song Of The Month (listen while reading!): 1000 Times - Big Blood - Indie Pop Summer is officially over so it’s time to get back to work. How did I do with last month’s goals? Work None this month. Music - Solo Project | Band Project Release Chlorine Videos Results: A I edited the videos for my new single. I also made a plan for when to release them with a focus on iterative improvement of views and learning how to release tiktoks/reels.

item.title: July 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: A bit of indecision on moving forward with projects, and slow progress, but fun summer activities.

item.title: June 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: June was hella busy with fun stuff and admin for switching jobs.

item.title: April/May 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: 2 months with lots of travel and starting a new job.

item.title: January 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: 2 months with lots of travel and starting a new job.

item.title: 2023 Goals Review, 2024 Goals Plan
item.description: I achieved 1 goal, and the rest were meh.
